newsitem.title: USA: Kansas feedlot cattle market very slow - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Kansas feedlot cattle market very slow - USDA.

text.p: Trade very slow. Few sales slaughter steers and heifers steady. Inquiry and demand rather light. Sales confirmed on 600 slaughter steers and 300 slaughter heifers Thursday.

For the week to date 131,300 head confirmed including 22300 head or about 17 percent previously contracted or formulated cattle and CME delivery cattle. Sales FOB feedlot net weights after 4 percent shrink.
Slaughter steers - Select and Choice 2-3 1200-1250 lbs 68.00, pen Select to mostly Choice 1310 lbs 68.00.
Slaughter heifers - Few Select and Choice 2-3 1050-1100 lbs 68.00.
Wk to date - 131,300 last week - 33,500 last year - 75,200
